query.query:
SELECT sample_07.description, sample_07.salary
FROM
  sample_07
WHERE
( sample_07.salary > 100000)
ORDER BY sample_07.salary DESC
LIMIT 1000

SELECT s07.description, s07.salary, s08.salary,
  s08.salary - s07.salary
FROM
  sample_07 s07 JOIN sample_08 s08
ON ( s07.code = s08.code)
WHERE
 s07.salary < s08.salary
ORDER BY s08.salary-s07.salary DESC
LIMIT 1000

name: Sample: Job loss
desc: Job loss among the top earners 2007-08

query.query:
SELECT s07.description, s07.total_emp, s08.total_emp, s07.salary
FROM
  sample_07 s07 JOIN 
  sample_08 s08
ON ( s07.code = s08.code )
WHERE
( s07.total_emp > s08.total_emp
 AND s07.salary > 100000 )
ORDER BY s07.salary DESC
LIMIT 1000

name: Sample: Customers for Shipping ZIP Code
desc: Customers for a given Shipping Address ZIP Code

query.query:
SELECT
  customers.id,
  customers.name
FROM customers
WHERE customers.addresses['shipping'].zip_code = '${zip_code}';

name: Sample: Total Amount per Order
desc: Total amount per order for each customer

query.query:
SELECT
  c.id AS customer_id,
  c.name AS customer_name,
  ords.order_id AS order_id,
  SUM(order_items.price * order_items.qty) AS total_amount
FROM
  customers c
LATERAL VIEW EXPLODE(c.orders) o AS ords
LATERAL VIEW EXPLODE(ords.items) i AS order_items
GROUP BY c.id, c.name, ords.order_id;

SELECT sample_07.description, sample_07.salary
FROM
  sample_07
WHERE
( sample_07.salary > 100000)
ORDER BY sample_07.salary DESC
LIMIT 1000

SELECT s07.description, s07.salary, s08.salary,
  s08.salary - s07.salary
FROM
  sample_07 s07 JOIN sample_08 s08
ON ( s07.code = s08.code)
WHERE
 s07.salary < s08.salary
ORDER BY s08.salary-s07.salary DESC
LIMIT 1000

name: Sample: Job loss
desc: Job loss among the top earners 2007-08

query.query:
SELECT s07.description, s07.total_emp, s08.total_emp, s07.salary
FROM
  sample_07 s07 JOIN 
  sample_08 s08
ON ( s07.code = s08.code )
WHERE
( s07.total_emp > s08.total_emp
 AND s07.salary > 100000 )
ORDER BY s07.salary DESC
LIMIT 1000

name: Sample: Total Amount per Order
desc: Total amount per order for each customer

query.query:
SELECT
  c.id AS customer_id,
 c.name AS customer_name,
  o.order_id,
  v.total
FROM
  customers c,
  c.orders o,
  (SELECT SUM(price * qty) total FROM o.items) v;

name: Sample: Customers for Shipping ZIP Code
desc: Customers for a given Shipping Address ZIP Code

query.query:
SELECT
  c.id,
  c.name
FROM customers c, c.addresses a
WHERE a.key = 'shipping' and a.zip_code = '${zip_code}';
